snippet: Cardinal Martini, one of the Roman Catholic Church’s most influential progressive thinkers, was considered a possible successor to Pope John Paul II.
abstract: Cardinal Carlo Maria Martini, one of the Roman Catholic Church's most influential progressive thinkers, dies at age 85.
lead_paragraph: Cardinal Martini, one of the Roman Catholic Church’s most influential progressive thinkers, was considered a possible successor to Pope John Paul II.

headline.seo: Cardinal Carlo Maria Martini, 85, Dies; Held Liberal Views
headline.main: Cardinal Carlo Martini, Papal Contender, Dies at 85
headline.print_headline: Cardinal Carlo Martini, 85, Dies; Voiced Liberal Views
